name: Garden Battle (Dizabanik Games)
description:
Game for Brackeys Game Jam made in 4 hours!

If several plants stand together, they become stronger!

My Unity WebGL crashed...

Controls:

Q - select shroom

W - select cactus

E - select broccoli

Shrooms give you 1 leaf every 7 seconds

Cactus evolves in 10 seconds:

1) has many hp and small damage

2) has medium hp and shoots far

Broccoli has big damage
